channel.title: filesystem on inge4pres
channel.description: Recent content in filesystem on inge4pres

item.title: A benchmark of AWS EFS
item.description: Amazon Web Services Elastic File Systemhas been to my knowledge the service to have the longest beta testing period: reason for this may be that not as many client as expected tested it and AWS received too few feedback on it or that there were issues not to release GA. I don’t want to speculate on which one is correct but now that it has been officially releasedI decided to give it a try and of course compare it to a self-managed solution on the same platform.
